titleStmt.title: New and singular patternes & workes of linnen. Seruing for paternes to make all sortes of lace, edginges, and cut-workes. : Newly inuented for the profite & contentment of ladies, gentlewomen, & others, that are desirous of this arte..
titleStmt.author: Vinciolo, Federico de, fl. 1587-1599.

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted by J. Wolfe and Ed. White.,

notesStmt.note: Printer's device on t.p. (McK. 216); ornamental border made up from separate head-and tail-pieces and male and female figures flanking the title; initials, text head- and tail-pieces.
Second part has title page with variant imprint: London Jmprinted by John Wolfe. 1591.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
